content.body: annevk: is the DOM issue at https://github.com/whatwg/dom/issues/793 just a duplicate of https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/5066 and https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/5067?
I mean, if the potential resolution is going to be in the infra spec anyway
or is it really a separate issue?
MikeSmith: itâ€™s DOM-specific in so far the general issue affects DOM so prolly good to track it there too
